Location 1: R&B's Steak and Fries Address: 2730 E Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78702, United States Website: https://www.rnbssteakandfries.com/
Location 2: Burro Cheese Address: 75 Rainey St, Austin, TX 78701, United States Website: http://www.burrocheesekitchen.com/
Location 3: Crimson Creek Smokehouse Address: 2250 US-290, Dripping Springs, TX 78620, United States Link: http://crimsoncreekbbq.com/

text.fulltitle: $10 vs $125 Food Truck Food in Austin, Texas!!

text.uploader: More Best Ever Food Review Show
